attributes.title: Access Requests [Filebeat Azure]
attributes.visState: {"type": "metrics", "title": "Access Requests [Filebeat Azure]", "params": {"time_field": "", "filter": {"query": "event.dataset :\"azure.activitylogs\" and azure.activitylogs.operation_name : *LISTKEYS*", "language": "kuery"}, "default_timefield": "@timestamp", "series": [{"filter": {"query": "event.outcome : \"success\" or event.outcome : \"Success\" ", "language": "kuery"}, "id": "61ca57f1-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417", "fill": "0", "line_width": "2", "point_size": 1, "color": "#68BC00", "axis_position": "right", "separate_axis": 0, "formatter": "number", "label": "Success", "chart_type": "line", "split_mode": "filter", "stacked": "none", "metrics": [{"type": "count", "id": "61ca57f2-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417"}]}, {"filter": {"query": "event.outcome : \"Failure\"  or event.outcome : \"failure\"  ", "language": "kuery"}, "id": "1b5f75a0-ec15-11e9-b6a7-21d19b63822a", "fill": "0", "line_width": "2", "point_size": 1, "color": "rgba(226,115,0,1)", "axis_position": "right", "separate_axis": 0, "formatter": "number", "label": "Failure", "chart_type": "line", "split_mode": "filter", "stacked": "none", "metrics": [{"type": "count", "id": "1b5f75a1-ec15-11e9-b6a7-21d19b63822a"}]}], "show_legend": 0, "axis_position": "left", "interval": "", "default_index_pattern": "metricbeat-*", "index_pattern": "filebeat-*", "id": "61ca57f0-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417", "isModelInvalid": false, "axis_formatter": "number", "show_grid": 1, "axis_scale": "normal", "type": "timeseries"}, "aggs": []}
